meanings.definition: Successfully bring about or reach (a desired objective, level, or result)
meanings.sent1: She achieves her dream of becoming a doctor through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent2: He always achieves good grades in school by studying diligently.
meanings.sent3: The little ant achieves the impossible task of moving a giant crumb.
meanings.sent4: Her determination achieves miracles in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The athlete achieves victory by pushing past his limits.

meanings.definition: Succeed in doing or attaining something by effort, skill, or courage
meanings.sent1: The team achieves a comeback victory with a last-minute goal.
meanings.sent2: With practice, she achieves perfection in her craft.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel achieves a new record in nut gathering.
meanings.sent4: His bravery achieves the rescue of the stranded hiker.
meanings.sent5: The student achieves success by never giving up on learning.
